name: NF ISO 20000-1 chapter 5.3 (b) | [GRC]
description: The provider must provide proof of compliancy against chapter 5.3 (b) of NF ISO 20000-1.
testingInformation: Requirements of chapter 5.3 (b) of NF ISO 20000-1 must be in place.
actionPlanInstructions: Getting expert guidances from an accredited ISO 20000 professionals will help identify gaps and provide a clear path toward the obtention of the certification.
actionPlanTitle: Requirements of chapter 5.3 (b) of NF ISO 20000-1 not attained.

controlMappingSources.sourceDescription: Requirements of chapter 5.2 of NF ISO 20000-1 must be implemented.
